entry.title: Combined CTV+APO to minimal TXHASH+CSFS
entry.summary: The email begins with the sender expressing gratitude for a fix and mentioning that they have updated the specification for a certain feature. They state that they have replaced "OP_0 as pubkey" with the taproot internal key. The sender acknowledges that this change is a valuable addition.The sender then mentions that if the proposed feature moves forward, they will carefully consider the hash contents for each mode, as indicated in a table provided at the end. They also mention the possibility of having mode 0 (referred to as "CTVish") commit to the spend_type and annex. The email concludes with a simple expression of thanks from the sender, signed off with their name, Brandon.
